statements: Immigration policy should uphold the rule of law and secure borders while offering clear, humane pathways that recognize economic contributions and preserve family unity. Investing in efficient processing, integration services, and employer accountability reduces irregular migration and strengthens local economies. Complementary measures—streamlined legal channels, robust vetting, and supports like language and job training—help newcomers integrate and protect communities.
